data.actual_result: The message displays, "It seems you've gone AFK on us. We've *went* ahead and moved you to the AFK channel."
data.expected_result: The message should display, "It seems like you've gone AFK on us. We've *gone* ahead and moved you to the AFK channel."
data.short_description: Grammatical mistake on the automatic AFK-channel message
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a voice channel - Do not interact with the machine (go AFK) - Wait until the popup message displays with the grammatical mistake.
